properties.description: Dispatched after a Guide is placed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_PLACE

properties.description: If true, the object originated on a master spread and was overridden. If false, the object either originated on a master spread and was not overridden, or the object did not originate on a master page.
properties.name: overridden

properties.description: An object that originated on a master page and has been overridden. Can return: PageItem, Guide, Graphic, Movie or Sound.
properties.name: overriddenMasterPageItem

properties.description: The page on which this page item appears.
properties.name: parentPage

properties.description: The unique ID of the Guide.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the Guide (a Spread or MasterSpread).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: The index of the Guide within its containing object.
properties.name: index

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: If true, the master page item can be overridden.
properties.name: allowOverrides

properties.description: The color of the guide, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.
properties.name: guideColor

properties.description: The orientation of the guide.
properties.name: orientation

properties.description: The location at which to place the guide relative to the current ruler zero point.
properties.name: location

properties.description: If true, horizontal orientation guides stop at the edges of the specified page. If false, the guides extends across the width of the spread and into the pasteboard area.
properties.name: fitToPage

properties.description: The view magnification as a percentage below which guides are no longer displayed. (Range: 5.0 to 4000.0)
properties.name: viewThreshold

properties.description: If true, the Guide is locked.
properties.name: locked

properties.description: The layer that the Guide is on.
properties.name: itemLayer

properties.description: The type of the guide.
properties.name: guideType

properties.description: The zone of the guide.
properties.name: guideZone

properties.description: A property that can be set to any string.
properties.name: label

properties.description: The name of the Guide; this is an alias to the Guide's label property.
properties.name: name

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Overrides a master page item and places the item on the document page as a new object.

parameters.description: The document page that contains the master page item to override.
parameters.name: destinationPage

methods.name: override

methods.description: Removes the override from a previously overridden master page item.
methods.name: removeOverride

methods.description: Detaches an overridden master page item from the master page.
methods.name: detach

methods.description: Moves the guide to a new location. Note: Either the to or the by parameter is required; if both parameters are defined, only the to value is used.

parameters.description: The new location of the guide, in the format [x, y]. (Optional)
parameters.name: to

parameters.description: The amount to move the guide relative to its current position, in the format [x, y]. (Optional)
parameters.name: by

methods.name: move

methods.description: Get the transformation values of the page item.
methods.name: transformValuesOf

methods.description: Get the coordinates of the given location in the specified coordinate system.

parameters.description: The location requested. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.
parameters.name: location
consideringRulerUnits
parameters.description: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

methods.name: resolve

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.description: The selection status of the Guide in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)

methods.description: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.
methods.name: insertLabel

methods.description: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.
methods.name: extractLabel

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Guide.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
